name: Woowup INC.
description: Developer of a cloud-based online marketing platform designed for automating customer retention campaigns and leveraging existing customer data. The company's platform converts the fans of a company into customers using a loyalty program on the website of the company or the Facebook fan page, allows integration with any sales channel, identifies the user as a single channel, and manages all point purchase and redemption interactions, enabling retailers to retain customers using automated marketing tools and artificial intelligence to predict purchases.
one_liner: Developer of a cloud-based online marketing platform designed for automating customer retention campaigns and leveraging existing customer data.
